page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: {Sticklepath and Bickington}are separated from{Barnstaple}by the Taw {estuary}and a long{hill.}They are relatively intensely populated areas, most housing being either side of A39. The open land is farmed up to the estuary banks.There is also a small wooded area.There are few places of work and most residents drive into or through the town across the{one bridge This leads to quite severe{traffic {problems}at peak times.It is a dormitory area and house prices are above average.Except for the immediate shopping,postal,cafe and pub amenities most people have to make the 2 mile journey into the town.Though N.Devon's {FE college}is here and at the foot of the hill there is a small industrial- shopping area which has a{hypermarket, a DIY store,the{railway station}and N.Devon's only{Leisure Centre.
